title: Which smartphones have the worst camera quality? - Quora

response.answer_text: Fake knock-off smartphones! From shady company is what I have been told! I heard about someone who bought An iPhone and it’s running Android with all fake apps and a fake App Store! The video is on YouTube. like I always been told: If it to good to be true it’s probably not! I have been told that the Wish App, the electronics are bad! I don’t know because I have never got electronics from the wish app. Just like Grey market camera and lenses You do save money but If it needs to be repaired an authorized repair shop For the Brand of gear, in the USA will not repair them or cover the warranty on them. So you have to use third-party repair shops and unauthorized repair shops!

Shock answer. My P20 Pro has terrible image quality from the selfie camera. It's soft rubbish and it's most likely the software. For what I paid (second hand) it's a good smartphone but really, its a poor copy of an iPhone. Although this has better battery life and performance I, in some ways, prefer my P9 Plus. The 3 times zoom is an attractive feature of the Pro.
